title: Research and Markets: Decision Matrix: Selecting a Hybrid Cloud and Virtualization Management Solution 2015-16
text:
Research and Markets: Decision Matrix: Selecting a Hybrid Cloud and Virtualization Management Solution 2015-16 September 29, 2015 06:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
DUBLIN--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/7lc4s5/decision_matrix ) has announced the addition of the "Decision Matrix: Selecting a Hybrid Cloud and Virtualization Management Solution, 2015-16" report to their offering. 
The decision matrix provides a side-by-side comparison of leading virtualization and hybrid cloud management solutions, looking at IT modernization from a data center infrastructure perspective. 
Introduction: The decision matrix provides a side-by-side comparison of leading virtualization and hybrid cloud management solutions, looking at IT modernization from a data center infrastructure perspective. 
Highlights: The hybrid cloud and virtualization management market is evolving rapidly and the vendors in this space mostly have a traditional infrastructure or systems management heritage. However, these are being challenged by newer entrants with approaches that were developed in the cloud era. 
Features and Benefits: Considers the significance of management in the virtualization and hybrid cloud environments and how this influences how technology is deployed, used, and controlled. Identifies the market leaders, market challengers, and market followers for virtualization and hybrid cloud management. 
Questions answered: Which global vendors are the market leaders in virtualization and hybrid cloud management? How can the market challengers and followers improve their positions? 
For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/7lc4s5/decision_matrix Contacts
